Interface IEmulatorProperties

Namespace: Snowflake.Execution.Extensibility
Assembly: Snowflake.Framework.Primitives.dll
Syntax
public interface IEmulatorProperties

Properties

Mimetypes

Gets a list of mimetypes this emulator can execute. This is a required key, an emulator without supported mimetypes will not display for any file type.

Declaration
IEnumerable<string> Mimetypes { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.String>

OptionalSystemFiles

Gets a list of BIOS files this emulator requires, listed under the optional metadata key optionalbios.

Declaration
IEnumerable<IBiosFile> OptionalSystemFiles { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<IBiosFile>

RequiredSystemFiles

Gets a list of BIOS files this emulator requires, listed under the optional metadata key requiredbios.

Declaration
IEnumerable<IBiosFile> RequiredSystemFiles { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<IBiosFile>

SaveFormat

Gets the save type this emulator uses. Emulators with the same save type will share a directory allowing save sharing across emulators. Should your emulator support a different save type, please change this to a unique value to avoid save conflicts.

Declaration
string SaveFormat { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.String

SpecialCapabilities

Gets a list of emulator special capabiities strings under the capabilities metadata key. This key is optional, and there is no formal specification for these capabilities, which may include ingame overlays, cloud saves, etc. It is used to indicate to clients that your emulator supports these capabilities upon a formally agreed upon API.

Declaration
IEnumerable<string> SpecialCapabilities { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.String>
